DOC.brief_summary: This study design investigate impact weight loss achieve IGB NASH early fibrosis select cohort patient obesity preselected high pre-test probability NASH early fibrosis base MRE-Hepatogram . In addition , study explore potential non-invasive imaging criterion NASH early fibrosis use EUS-Elastography .
DOC.brief_title: EUS Guided Core Liver Biopsy IGB Placement Diagnosis Management NASH Obesity
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnose Nonalcoholic Steatohepatitis early evidence fibrosis see MREhepatogram Referred clinically intragastric balloon placement weight loss Women pregnant plan pregnant breastfeed Previous history gastric surgery Current recent ( within 6 month ) gastric duodenal ulcer Gastroparesis Liver cirrhosis Coagulopathy active use coagulation Inability provide write informed consent
